Title: Daredevil
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Vincent D'Onofrio
Plot: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Primetime Emmys. Another 5 wins & 24 nominations.
